info.name: Egyptian Epochs

The library image is a composition of four of the game tiles.
info.description: Bid, auction, and collect ancient Egyptian themed objects. Highest score after 3 rounds wins.
info.similarAwards:
2016 Juego del AÃ±o Recommended
2000 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
1999 Meeples' Choice Award
info.helpText:
- Have players take seats and press the Setup button in the top right to set the track lengths, distribute starting suns, and assign the start player appropriately.
- Within player areas you have a top row for suns available to bid and a bottom row for suns won during this epoch and not usable until the next.
- At the top of the board, the top row is for Ra tiles and the second row for tiles in the auction lot.
- After each player's turn, press the End Turn button to advance the turn indicator.
- At the end of the epoch, score using the counter in your player areas and then discard your tiles without red scarab symbols to the discard pile in the top right corner.

findCurrentSeatIDRoutine.note: Amongst them, select the seat which is the current turn

least one is a Flood

Highest suns total +5VP
Lowest suns total -5VP
